# FieldDefinition._Type property

Human readable value type. Possible values: `Int, Float, String, Bool, Color, ExternEnum.XXX, LocalEnum.XXX, Point, FilePath`. If the field is an array, this field will look like `Array<...>` (eg. `Array<Int>`, `Array<Point>` etc.) NOTE: if you enable the advanced option Use Multilines type, you will have "*Multilines*" instead of "*String*" when relevant.

```csharp
public string _Type { get; set; }
```
